rukus.text: These (list) constitute proofs Quran; profound scripture
Kto observe Zmluva Prayers (Salat) dat zavazny laska k bliznemu (Zakat) they som zretel Hereafter absolutely certain
Those nie verit v Hereafter my zdobit ich robota ich oci. Thus they zotrvat omyl
bol these incur chory retribution Hereafter they je zly losers
Iste ona receiving Quran z Wise Omniscient
Recall lenze Moses said do jeho rodina ja see zapalit; let mna bring ona zvest therefrom torch zohriat ona
When he pojdem it he bol vola sa Zehnat je Jeden speaking zapalit those around it Glory bol GOD Lord universe
O Moses this bol Mna GOD Almighty Wise
Throw nadol tvoj staff When he saw it moving mat rad demon he turned around fled O Moses nie bol afraid. Moj posol nie fear
those kto commit transgression potom zastupid righteousness after zhresit; ja Forgiving Merciful
Put tvoj hand v tvoj pocket it pod biely blemish These som 9 zazrak do Pharaoh jeho ludia for they bol zlomyselny ludia
When our zazrak presented them zretelny profound they said This bol obviously kuzlo
They zamietnut them utterly convinced z ich zlo ways ich arrogance. Note consequences evildoers
